mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT INFO.* , MEM.COM_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( A.ORDER_DATE ,DECODE(LENGTH(A.ORDER_DATE), 8, 'YYYYMMDD', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ) ,DECODE(LENGTH(A.ORDER_DATE), 8, 'yyyy-MM-dd', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:SS') ) AS ORDER_DATE /*주문일자*/ , A.MEMB_ID /*회원ID (주문자)*/ , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(A.MEMB_ID) AS MEMB_NM /*회원ID명(주문자)*/ , C.RECV_PERS /*수령인*/ , A.ORDER_AMT /*주문금액*/ , A.ORDER_CON /*주문상태*/ , A.PAY_METD /*결제수단*/ FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM A /*주문정보 마스터*/ INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD B ON A.ORDER_NUM = B.ORDER_NUM INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODDLAIXM C /*주문배송지정보*/ ON A.ORDER_NUM = C.ORDER_NUM AND POLARBEAR.FC_GET_ORDER_SUPRID(A.ORDER_NUM, #{MEMB_ID}) = 'Y' INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM D ON B.PD_CODE = D.PD_CODE WHERE A.DEL_YN IS NULL OR A.DEL_YN = 'N' ) INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM MEM ON INFO.MEMB_ID = MEM.MEMB_ID )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT INFO.*, MEM.COM_NAME, MEM.ADM_REF FROM ( SELECT A.ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( ORDER_DATE, DECODE(LENGTH(ORDER_DATE),8,'YYYYMMDD','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')), DECODE(LENGTH(ORDER_DATE),8,'yyyy-MM-dd','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:SS') ) AS ORDER_DATE /*주문일자*/ , A.MEMB_ID /*회원ID (주문자)*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(A.MEMB_ID) FROM DUAL) AS MEMB_NM /*회원ID명(주문자)*/ , C.RECV_PERS /*수령인*/ , (SELECT PD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD WHERE ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM AND ROWNUM = 1) AS PD_NAME , A.ORDER_AMT /*주문금액*/ , A.ORDER_CON /*주문상태*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.ORDER_CON) FROM DUAL) AS ORDER_CON_NM /*주문상태 명*/ , A.PAY_METD /*결제수단*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.PAY_METD) FROM DUAL) AS PAY_METD_NM /*결제수단 명*/ , (SELECT COUNT(*)-1 FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD WHERE ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM) AS count /*주문 제품 갯수*/ , ORDER_DTM /*주문일시*/ , PAY_DTM /*결제일시*/ , DECODE(DAP_YN, 'Y', DLVY_AMT, '0') AS DLVY_AMT /*배송비*/ , DECODE(DLAR_GUBN, 'DLAR_GUBN_05', '현장출고', '직배송요청') AS DLAR_GUBN /*출고방식*/ , DLVY_MSG /*배송메세지 유무*/ , DECODE(LENGTH(DLAR_DATE), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DLAR_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') || ' ' || DLAR_TIME AS DLAR_DATE_TIME /*출고 시간*/ , DLAR_DATE /*배송출고일자*/ , DECODE(DLAR_TIME, '오전', 1, '오후', 2, '', 4, 3) DLAR_TIME /*배송출고시간*/ , CPON_YN /*쿠폰사용여부*/ FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM A /*주문정보 마스터*/ INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODDLAIXM C /*주문배송지정보*/ ON A.ORDER_NUM = C.ORDER_NUM WHERE DEL_YN = 'Y' ) INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM MEM ON INFO.MEMB_ID = MEM.MEMB_ID )
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE desc
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE asc
ORDER BY MEMB_NM desc, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY MEMB_NM asc, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY COM_NAME desc nulls last, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY COM_NAME asc, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY PAY_DTM desc nulls last, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY PAY_DTM asc, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY DLAR_DATE desc, DLAR_TIME ASC, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY DLAR_DATE asc, DLAR_TIME ASC, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE desc, ORDER_NUM ASC

SELECT ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( ORDER_DATE, DECODE(LENGTH(ORDER_DATE),8,'YYYYMMDD','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')), DECODE(LENGTH(ORDER_DATE),8,'yyyy-MM-dd','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:SS') ) AS ORDER_DATE /*주문일자*/ , MEMB_ID /*회원ID (주문자)*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(MEMB_ID) FROM DUAL) AS MEMB_NM , ORDER_AMT /*주문금액*/ , ORDER_CON /*주문상태*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(ORDER_CON) FROM DUAL) AS ORDER_CON_NM , PAY_METD /*결제수단*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(PAY_METD) FROM DUAL) AS PAY_METD_NM , DAP_YN /*배송비결재여부*/ , DLVY_CON /*배송상태*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(DLVY_CON) FROM DUAL) AS DLVY_CON_NM , DLVY_COM /*배송업체*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(DLVY_COM) FROM DUAL) AS DLVY_COM_NM , DLVY_TDN /*배송운송장번호*/ , CNCL_CON /*취소상태*/ , RFND_CON /*환불상태*/ , CNCL_MSG /*취소사유*/ , DLVY_AMT /*배송비*/ , PAY_DTM /*결제일시*/ , CPON_YN /*쿠폰사용여부*/ , MBDC_RATE /*회원할인율*/ FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}

SELECT ORDER_DTNUM /*주문상세번호*/ , ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , PD_CODE /*제품코드*/ , PD_NAME /*제품명*/ , ORDER_QTY /*주문 수량*/ , ORDER_AMT /*주문금액*/ , PDDC_VAL /*제품할인 값*/ , PD_PRICE /*상품가격*/ , PDDC_GUBN /*상품할인구분*/ , (SELECT CUT_UNIT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDCUTXM WHERE PD_CODE = A.PD_CODE AND SEQ = PD_CUT_SEQ ) PD_CUT_SEQ , NVL ( (SELECT COMDCD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_COMCODXD WHERE COMM_CODE = 'OPTION_GUBN' AND COMD_CODE = A.OPTION_CODE ), (SELECT OPTDCD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_OPTCODXD M, POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM N WHERE M.OPTD_CODE = A.OPTION_CODE AND N.PD_CODE = A.PD_CODE AND M.OPTM_CODE = N.OPTION_GUBN) ) AS OPTION_CODE FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD A /*주문정보 상세*/ WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND ORDER_QTY > 0 ORDER BY ORDER_DTNUM

SELECT ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , DLAR_GUBN /*배송지구분*/ , RECV_PERS /*수령인*/ , POST_NUM /*우편번호*/ , BASC_ADDR /*기본주소*/ , DTL_ADDR /*상세주소*/ , RECV_TELN /*수령인 전화번호*/ , RECV_CPON /*수령인 휴대전화*/ , DLVY_MSG /*배송메세지*/ , (SELECT ADM_REF FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM A, POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM B WHERE A.MEMB_ID = B.MEMB_ID AND B.ORDER_NUM =#{ORDER_NUM}) AS ADM_REF /*관리자설명참조*/ , DLAR_DATE /* 출고일 */ , DLAR_TIME /* 배송시간/출고시간 */ FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODDLAIXM /*주문배송지정보 */ WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ORDER_DATE /*주문일자*/ , PAY_DTM /*결제일시*/ , ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , ORDER_CON , MEM.MEMB_ID AS MEMB_ID , TRIM(MEMB_NM) AS MEMB_NM /*회원ID명(주문자)*/ , MEM.COM_NAME /*(회사명)*/ , PD_NAME || DECODE(count,0,'',' 외 '||count||'종') AS PD_NAME /*주문상품*/ , ORDER_AMT , DLVY_AMT , ORDER_AMT - DLVY_AMT AS REAL_AMT , ORDER_CON_NM || DECODE(INFO.PAY_METD_NM,'','',DECODE(INFO.PAY_METD_NM,'','',' (' || INFO.PAY_METD_NM || ')')) AS ORDER_CON_NM , DLAR_GUBN || ' ' || DLAR_DATE_TIME AS DLAR_GUBN , DLVY_MSG , INFO.ADM_REF , PAY_METD /*20190531_결제수단추가*/ FROM ( SELECT A.ORDER_NUM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ORDER_DATE,DECODE(LENGTH(ORDER_DATE),8,'YYYYMMDD','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) ,DECODE(LENGTH(ORDER_DATE),8,'yyyy-MM-dd','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:SS')) AS ORDER_DATE /*주문일자*/ , A.MEMB_ID , (SELECT MEMB_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM WHERE MEMB_ID = A.MEMB_ID) AS MEMB_NM , C.RECV_PERS , (SELECT PD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD WHERE ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM AND ROWNUM = 1) AS PD_NAME , A.ORDER_AMT , A.ORDER_CON , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.ORDER_CON) AS ORDER_CON_NM , A.PAY_METD , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.PAY_METD) AS PAY_METD_NM , (SELECT COUNT(*)-1 FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD WHERE ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM) AS count , ORDER_DTM , PAY_DTM , DECODE(DAP_YN,'Y',DLVY_AMT,'0') AS DLVY_AMT , DECODE(DLAR_GUBN,'DLAR_GUBN_05','현장출고','직배송요청') AS DLAR_GUBN , DECODE(DLVY_MSG,'',' ','있음') AS DLVY_MSG , DECODE((SELECT ADM_REF FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM MBINFO, POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM ODINFO WHERE MBINFO.MEMB_ID = ODINFO.MEMB_ID AND ODINFO.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM),'',' ','있음') AS ADM_REF
,DECODE(LENGTH(DLAR_DATE),8,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DLAR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'')|| ' '||DLAR_TIME AS DLAR_DATE_TIME /*출고 시간*/ FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM A INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODDLAIXM C /*주문배송지정보*/ ON A.ORDER_NUM = C.ORDER_NUM WHERE DEL_YN = 'Y' ) INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM MEM ON INFO.MEMB_ID = MEM.MEMB_ID )
AND (1,ORDER_NUM) IN
(1,#{item})
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE desc
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE asc
ORDER BY MEMB_NM desc
ORDER BY MEMB_NM asc
ORDER BY COM_NAME desc nulls last
ORDER BY COM_NAME asc
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE desc

SELECT ODA.* , PD.PD_BARCD , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(PD.TAX_GUBN) AS TAX_GUBN , ODA.PD_PRICE - ODA.PDDC_VAL AS ORDER_PREICE FROM ( SELECT ODM.* , ODD.PD_CODE , ODD.PD_NAME , (SELECT CUT_UNIT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDCUTXM WHERE PD_CODE = ODD.PD_CODE AND SEQ = ODD.PD_CUT_SEQ ) PD_CUT_SEQ , (SELECT COMDCD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_COMCODXD WHERE COMM_CODE = 'OPTION_GUBN' AND COMD_CODE = ODD.OPTION_CODE) OPTION_NAME , ODD.ORDER_QTY , ODD.PD_PRICE , ODD.PDDC_VAL , ODD.ORDER_AMT FROM ( SELECT ORDER_NUM ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ORDER_DATE,DECODE(LENGTH(ORDER_DATE),8,'YYYYMMDD','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) ,DECODE(LENGTH(ORDER_DATE),8,'yyyy-MM-dd','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:SS')) AS ORDER_DATE , OD.MEMB_ID , ME.COM_NAME , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(OD.MEMB_ID) AS MEMB_NM , DAP_YN FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM OD,POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM ME WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND OD.MEMB_ID = ME.MEMB_ID ) ODM LEFT OUTER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD ODD ON ODM.ORDER_NUM = ODD.ORDER_NUM AND ODD.ORDER_QTY > 0 ) ODA LEFT OUTER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM PD ON ODA.PD_CODE = PD.PD_CODE
mapper.update: UPDATE POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM SET DEL_YN = 'N' /*삭제여부*/ ,MOD_DTM = SYSDATE /*수정날짜*/ ,MODP_ID = #{MODP_ID} /*수정자*/ WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND ORDER_CON IN ('ORDER_CON_01','ORDER_CON_04')
UPDATE POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD SET DEL_YN = 'N' /*삭제여부*/ ,MOD_DTM = SYSDATE /*수정날짜*/ ,MODP_ID = #{MODP_ID} /*수정자*/ WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND ORDER_CON IN ('ORDER_CON_01','ORDER_CON_04')
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ORDER_DATE /*주문일자*/ , PAY_DTM /*결제일시*/ , ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , ORDER_CON , MEM.MEMB_ID AS MEMB_ID , TRIM(MEMB_NM) AS MEMB_NM /*회원ID명(주문자)*/ , MEM.COM_NAME /*(회사명)*/ , PD_NAME || DECODE(count,0,'',' 외 '||count||'종') AS PD_NAME /*주문상품*/ , ORDER_AMT , DLVY_AMT , ORDER_AMT - DLVY_AMT AS REAL_AMT , ORDER_CON_NM || DECODE(INFO.PAY_METD_NM,'','',DECODE(INFO.PAY_METD_NM,'','',' (' || INFO.PAY_METD_NM || ')')) AS ORDER_CON_NM , DLAR_GUBN || ' ' || DLAR_DATE_TIME AS DLAR_GUBN , DLVY_MSG , INFO.ADM_REF , PAY_METD /*20190531_결제수단추가*/ FROM ( SELECT A.ORDER_NUM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ORDER_DATE,DECODE(LENGTH(ORDER_DATE),8,'YYYYMMDD','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) ,DECODE(LENGTH(ORDER_DATE),8,'yyyy-MM-dd','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:SS')) AS ORDER_DATE /*주문일자*/ , A.MEMB_ID , (SELECT MEMB_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM WHERE MEMB_ID = A.MEMB_ID) AS MEMB_NM , C.RECV_PERS , (SELECT PD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD WHERE ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM AND ROWNUM = 1) AS PD_NAME , A.ORDER_AMT , A.ORDER_CON , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.ORDER_CON) AS ORDER_CON_NM , A.PAY_METD , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.PAY_METD) AS PAY_METD_NM , (SELECT COUNT(*)-1 FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD WHERE ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM) AS count , ORDER_DTM , PAY_DTM , DECODE(DAP_YN,'Y',DLVY_AMT,'0') AS DLVY_AMT , DECODE(DLAR_GUBN,'DLAR_GUBN_05','현장출고','직배송요청') AS DLAR_GUBN , DECODE(DLVY_MSG,'',' ','있음') AS DLVY_MSG , DECODE((SELECT ADM_REF FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM MBINFO, POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM ODINFO WHERE MBINFO.MEMB_ID = ODINFO.MEMB_ID AND ODINFO.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM),'',' ','있음') AS ADM_REF
,DECODE(LENGTH(DLAR_DATE),8,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DLAR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'')|| ' '||DLAR_TIME AS DLAR_DATE_TIME /*출고 시간*/ FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM A INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODDLAIXM C /*주문배송지정보*/ ON A.ORDER_NUM = C.ORDER_NUM WHERE DEL_YN = 'Y' ) INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM MEM ON INFO.MEMB_ID = MEM.MEMB_ID )
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE desc
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE asc
ORDER BY MEMB_NM desc
ORDER BY MEMB_NM asc
ORDER BY COM_NAME desc nulls last
ORDER BY COM_NAME asc
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT INFO.* , MEM.COM_NAME , MEM.ADM_REF , CASE #{MEMB_GUBN} WHEN 'MEMB_GUBN_04' THEN ( SELECT SUM(SUPR_AMT) FROM ( SELECT B.SUPR_ID , A.DLVR_INDI_YN , A.DLVY_SORT , C.ORDER_NUM , CASE A.DLVY_SORT WHEN 'PRICE_DESC' THEN MAX(C.DLVY_AMT) ELSE MIN(C.DLVY_AMT) END AS SUPR_AMT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM A, POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM B, POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD C WHERE A.SUPR_ID = B.SUPR_ID AND A.PD_CODE = C.PD_CODE AND A.PD_CODE = C.SETPD_CODE AND B.SUPR_ID=#{LOGIN_SUPR_ID} AND C.ORDER_NUM =INFO.ORDER_NUM GROUP BY B.SUPR_ID, A.DLVR_INDI_YN, A.DLVY_SORT, C.ORDER_NUM) G GROUP BY G.ORDER_NUM, G.SUPR_ID) ELSE INFO.DLVY_AMT END AS DLVY_AMT_REAL FROM ( SELECT A.ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( A.ORDER_DATE ,DECODE(LENGTH(A.ORDER_DATE), 8, 'YYYYMMDD', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ) ,DECODE(LENGTH(A.ORDER_DATE), 8, 'yyyy-MM-dd', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:SS') ) AS ORDER_DATE , A.MEMB_ID /*회원ID (주문자)*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(A.MEMB_ID) FROM DUAL) AS MEMB_NM /*회원명 (주문자)*/ , C.RECV_PERS /*수령인*/ , B.PD_CODE /*상품코드*/ , B.PD_NAME /*상품명*/ , B.PD_PRICE /*판매단가*/ , CASE WHEN B.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_02' THEN B.PD_PRICE - B.PDDC_VAL WHEN B.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_03' THEN B.PD_PRICE - (B.PD_PRICE * (B.PDDC_VAL/100)) ELSE B.PD_PRICE END REAL_PRICE /*제품할인가*/ , B.ORDER_QTY /*상품수량*/ , B.ORDER_AMT /*상품소계*/ , A.ORDER_AMT AS ORDER_TOT /*주문총액*/ , B.ORDER_CON /*주문상태*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(B.ORDER_CON) FROM DUAL) AS ORDER_CON_NM /*주문상태 명*/ , A.PAY_METD /*결제수단*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.PAY_METD) FROM DUAL) AS PAY_METD_NM /*결제수단 명*/ , TO_CHAR(A.ORDER_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ORDER_DTM /*주문일시*/ , TO_CHAR(A.PAY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS PAY_DTM /*결제일시*/ , DECODE(LENGTH(C.DLAR_DATE), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.DLAR_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') || ' ' || C.DLAR_TIME AS DLAR_DATE_TIME /*출고 시간*/ , C.DLAR_DATE /**/ , C.DLAR_TIME /**/ , A.CPON_YN /*쿠폰사용여부*/ , NVL(B.INPUT_CNT, 0) AS INPUT_CNT /*입수량*/ , B.BOX_PDDC_GUBN /*박스할인율*/ , B.BOX_PDDC_VAL /*박스할인값*/ , B.MBDC_VAL /*상품개당 회원할인금액*/ , B.DLVY_CON /*배송상태*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(B.DLVY_CON) FROM DUAL) AS DLVY_CON_NM , B.DLVY_COM /*배송업체*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(B.DLVY_COM) FROM DUAL) AS DLVY_COM_NM , B.DLVY_TDN /*운송장번호*/ , (SELECT SUPR_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SPINFOXM TMP WHERE TMP.SUPR_ID = B.SUPR_ID) SUPR_ID_NAME /*공급처*/ , D.SUPR_ID , D.PD_IWHUPRC /*입고단가*/ , B.ORDER_DTNUM , NVL( (SELECT COM_BUNB FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM CC WHERE CC.MEMB_ID = A.MEMB_ID), '') AS COM_BUNB /* 사업자등록번호 */ , DECODE(A.DAP_YN, 'Y', A.DLVY_AMT, '0') AS DLVY_AMT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM A /*주문정보 마스터*/ INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD B /*주문정보 상세*/ ON A.ORDER_NUM = B.ORDER_NUM INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODDLAIXM C /*주문배송지정보*/ ON A.ORDER_NUM = C.ORDER_NUM AND POLARBEAR.FC_GET_ORDER_SUPRID(A.ORDER_NUM, #{MEMB_ID}) = 'Y' INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM D /*상품정보*/ ON B.PD_CODE = D.PD_CODE WHERE A.DEL_YN IS NULL OR A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND D.SUPR_ID=#{LOGIN_SUPR_ID}
) INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM MEM ON INFO.MEMB_ID = MEM.MEMB_ID )

ORDER BY DLAR_DATE asc, DLAR_TIME ASC, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY ORDER_NUM DESC, ORDER_DTNUM ASC, PAY_DTM DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT INFO.*, MEM.COM_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( A.ORDER_DATE ,DECODE(LENGTH(A.ORDER_DATE), 8, 'YYYYMMDD', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ) ,DECODE(LENGTH(A.ORDER_DATE), 8, 'yyyy-MM-dd', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:SS') ) AS ORDER_DATE /*주문일자*/ , A.MEMB_ID /*회원ID (주문자)*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(A.MEMB_ID) FROM DUAL) AS MEMB_NM /*회원명 (주문자)*/ , C.RECV_PERS /*수령인*/ , B.PD_CODE /*상품코드*/ , B.PD_NAME /*상품명*/ , B.PD_PRICE /*판매단가*/ , B.PDDC_GUBN /*제품할인구분*/ , B.PDDC_VAL /*제품할인값*/ , CASE WHEN B.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_02' THEN B.PD_PRICE - B.PDDC_VAL WHEN B.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_03' THEN B.PD_PRICE - (B.PD_PRICE * (B.PDDC_VAL/100)) ELSE B.PD_PRICE END REAL_PRICE /*제품할인가*/ , B.ORDER_QTY /*상품수량*/ , B.ORDER_AMT /*상품소계*/ , A.ORDER_AMT AS ORDER_TOT /*주문총액*/ , A.ORDER_CON /*주문상태*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.ORDER_CON) FROM DUAL) AS ORDER_CON_NM /*주문상태 명*/ , A.PAY_METD /*결제수단*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.PAY_METD) FROM DUAL) AS PAY_METD_NM /*결제수단 명*/ , TO_CHAR(A.ORDER_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ORDER_DTM /*주문일시*/ , TO_CHAR(A.PAY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS PAY_DTM /*결제일시*/
, DECODE(LENGTH(C.DLAR_DATE), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.DLAR_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') || ' ' || C.DLAR_TIME AS DLAR_DATE_TIME /*출고 시간*/ , C.DLAR_DATE /**/ , C.DLAR_TIME /**/ , A.CPON_YN /*쿠폰사용여부*/ , NVL(B.INPUT_CNT, 0) AS INPUT_CNT /*입수량*/ , B.BOX_PDDC_GUBN /*박스할인율*/ , B.BOX_PDDC_VAL /*박스할인값*/ , B.MBDC_VAL /*상품개당 회원할인금액*/ , B.DLVY_CON /*배송상태*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(B.DLVY_CON) FROM DUAL) AS DLVY_CON_NM , B.DLVY_COM /*배송업체*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(B.DLVY_COM) FROM DUAL) AS DLVY_COM_NM , B.DLVY_TDN /*운송장번호*/ , (SELECT SUPR_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SPINFOXM TMP WHERE TMP.SUPR_ID = B.SUPR_ID) SUPR_ID /*공급처*/ , D.PD_IWHUPRC /*입고단가*/ , B.ORDER_DTNUM , NVL( (SELECT COM_BUNB FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM CC WHERE CC.MEMB_ID = a.MEMB_ID), '') AS COM_BUNB /* 사업자등록번호 */ , DECODE(B.ORDER_DTNUM, 1, DECODE(A.DAP_YN, 'Y', A.DLVY_AMT, '0')) AS DLVY_AMT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM A /*주문정보 마스터*/ INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD B /*주문정보 상세*/ ON A.ORDER_NUM = B.ORDER_NUM INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODDLAIXM C /*주문배송지정보*/ ON A.ORDER_NUM = C.ORDER_NUM INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM D /*상품정보*/ ON B.PD_CODE = D.PD_CODE WHERE A.DEL_YN IS NULL
AND (B.ORDER_NUM || '-' ||B.ORDER_DTNUM) IN
#{item}
OR A.DEL_YN = 'N'
) INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM MEM ON INFO.MEMB_ID = MEM.MEMB_ID )
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE desc
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE asc
ORDER BY MEMB_NM desc, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY MEMB_NM asc, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY COM_NAME desc nulls last, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY COM_NAME asc, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY PAY_DTM desc nulls last, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY PAY_DTM asc, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY DLAR_DATE desc, DLAR_TIME ASC, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY DLAR_DATE asc, DLAR_TIME ASC, ORDER_NUM ASC
ORDER BY ORDER_NUM DESC, ORDER_DTNUM ASC, PAY_DTM DESC

SELECT B.ORDER_NUM , D.RECV_PERS , D.RECV_TELN , D.RECV_CPON , A.MEMB_MAIL , A.COM_NAME , REGEXP_REPLACE(A.COM_BUNB, '[^0-9]') AS COM_BUNB , A.COM_TELN , '['|| D.POST_NUM || '] ' || D.BASC_ADDR || ' ' || D.DTL_ADDR AS RECV_ADDR , A.KEEP_LOCATION , D.DLVY_MSG , A.ADM_REF , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.DLAR_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DLAR_DATE , NVL(DLAR_TIME, ' ') AS DLAR_TIME , B.ORDER_AMT AS ORDER_TOT , B.DLVY_AMT , REGEXP_REPLACE(S.BIZR_NUM, '[^0-9]') AS BIZR_NUM , S.SUPR_NAME , S.RPRS_NAME , '['|| S.POST_NUM || '] ' || S.BASC_ADDR || ' ' || S.DTL_ADDR AS BIZR_ADDR , S.TEL_NUM , S.BIZR_STYLE , S.BIZR_EVENT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM A, POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM B, POLARBEAR.TB_ODDLAIXM D LEFT OUTER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_SPINFOXM S ON S.SUPR_ID = #{SUPR_ID} WHERE A.MEMB_ID = B.MEMB_ID AND B.ORDER_NUM = D.ORDER_NUM AND B.ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}

SELECT B.ORDER_NUM , D.RECV_PERS , D.RECV_TELN , D.RECV_CPON , A.MEMB_MAIL , A.COM_NAME , A.COM_BUNB , A.COM_TELN , '['|| D.POST_NUM || '] ' || D.BASC_ADDR || ' ' || D.DTL_ADDR AS RECV_ADDR , C.PD_CODE , C.PD_BARCD , E.PD_NAME , C.PD_STD , C.STD_UNIT , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(KEEP_GUBN) FROM DUAL) AS KEEP_GUBN , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(PACKING_GUBN) FROM DUAL) AS PACKING_GUBN , CASE WHEN E.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_02' THEN E.PD_PRICE - E.PDDC_VAL WHEN E.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_03' THEN E.PD_PRICE - (E.PD_PRICE * (E.PDDC_VAL / 100)) ELSE E.PD_PRICE END REAL_PRICE , E.PD_PRICE , E.ORDER_QTY , E.ORDER_AMT , B.CPON_YN , B.DLVY_AMT , A.KEEP_LOCATION , D.DLVY_MSG , A.ADM_REF , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.DLAR_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DLAR_DATE , NVL(DLAR_TIME, ' ') AS DLAR_TIME , B.ORDER_AMT AS ORDER_TOT , NVL( (SELECT '(세절방식: '|| NVL(CUT_UNIT, '') ||')' FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDCUTXM G WHERE G.PD_CODE = E.PD_CODE AND G.SEQ = E.PD_CUT_SEQ),'' ) AS CUT_UNIT , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(OPTION_CODE) FROM DUAL) AS OPTION_NAME , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(DLVY_GUBN) FROM DUAL) AS DLVY_NAME , E.DLVY_TDN , E.DLVY_COM
FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM A, POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM B, POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM C, POLARBEAR.TB_ODDLAIXM D, POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD E WHERE A.MEMB_ID = B.MEMB_ID AND B.ORDER_NUM = E.ORDER_NUM AND B.ORDER_NUM = D.ORDER_NUM AND E.PD_CODE = C.PD_CODE AND E.ORDER_QTY > 0 AND B.ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} ORDER BY ORDER_DTNUM
